Remarks: "Group A", "Top 6 Flag Colors"

Quest Giver: Male student by the window, Classroom 2-2
Remarks: Talk to the girl on the roof 3 times, can only ask one question per day.*

Quest Giver: Man to the west, Samegawa Flood Plain
Remarks: Check barrels in the Twisted Shopping District
Dropped by Avenger Knight, Yukiko's Castle 6-7F
Dropped by Magical Magus, Yukiko's Castle 6-7F

Quest Giver: Male student near Science Room, Practice Building 1F
Remarks: Dropped by Heat Balance, Yukiko's Castle 6-7F
Talk to the girl on 3 different days, in the school lobby, then Learning Building 2F (select "I read it") twice

Quest: I Wish I Didn't Crave for Snacks
Remarks: Talk to Slim Lady, Shopping District South; get "Meat Gum" from Chie and give to Slim Lady

Quest: We Wish our Dog Would Return
Remarks: Talk gently to the dog at the Riverbed and Shopping District North* until it can be fed a Steak Skewer (buy at Souzai Daigaku)

Talk to the boy on Samegawa Flood Plain ("I don't want your money"); give him a Prize Sticker from the Shopping Network; talk to him again, then get a sticker from Nanako to give him, then talk to him the following day

Quest: I Wish My Life Had Meaning Again
Reward: Hermit Social Link Up, Unfinished Model
Remarks: Talk to the Haggard Man, Shopping District North ("Want me to make it?"); build the Unfinished Model over 4 days, then give it to him

Quest: I Wish I Was Better at Speaking
Remarks: Talk to the girl on the roof; "Do you need help speaking?", "Give her lessons" (Expression 3+), then "Apologize to her" (Courage 3+)

Quest: I Wish I Didn't Fear Cats
Remarks: Talk to the fearful man at Samegawa Flood Plain ("Is it a cat?"), then talk to the cat outside the Dojima Residence, and bring the man to see the cat; give the man a Red Goldfish, then talk to him the next day

Quest: I Wish My Wallet Would Return
Remarks: Talk to the woman near the trash can at Samegawa Flood Plain; check the riverbank bushes to find the wrong wallet and try to give it to her; find her wallet in the bushes outside Tatsuhime Shrine and give it to her

Catch a "Huge Fish", bring to the Old Man and ask about the Guardian; use the Angler's Set to catch it (only available on rainy days or in December). After catching a River Guardian, obtain the Deep-Sea Rod from the old man on the riverbank. It will allow you to fish the Sea Guardian on Shichiri Beach.
Dropped by Laughing Table, Yukiko's Castle 6-7F
Dropped by Trance Twins, Yukiko's Castle 3-5F

Quest Giver: Man in front of bookstore, Shopping District South
Remarks: Give him a Peach Seed

Quest Giver: Man in front of theater, Okina City
Remarks: You will be given tissues to distribute to everyone in the area. Do this, and talk to him again to complete the request.
Feed the cat one fish
Feed the cat fish once a day for 7 days
Feed the cat fish 20 times. If you have extra Guardian to give the cat, you only need to feed it 4-5 times.
Dropped by Bribed Fuzz, Steamy Bathhouse 1-2F

Quest Giver: Loud Old Man, Shopping District North
Remarks: Dropped by Selfish Basalt, Steamy Bathhouse 5-7F
Buy Cabbage Seedlings and grow three Hiranya Cabbages in your garden. Give these to the housewife.
Dropped by Tranquil Idol, Steamy Bathhouse 6-8F
Dropped by Liberating Idol, Marukyu Striptease 3-10F
Dropped by Crying Table, Steamy Bathhouse 8-10F
Dropped by Grave Beetle, Steamy Bathhouse 8-10F

Quest Giver: Orange haired girl, Shopping District South
Remarks: Talk to her twin on Samegawa Flood Plain, then return

Obtain the Iai Katana from Daidara Metalworks (sell six Golden Cloths dropped by Phantom Mage, Yukiko's Castle 5-7F), trade the katana to a student on Practice Building 2F to obtain the Cleaning Mop. After accepting the hospital job, you can buy the Cleaning Uniform from Croco Fur in Okina (¥14,800). Show these to the student on 3F.
Give Daidara an Inaba Trout. This can be fished from the river or bought from Tanaka on 6/5 and 9/11.

Quest Giver: Male student near Science Room, Practice Building 1F
Remarks: Dropped by Silver Dice, Marukyu Striptease 5-8F
Buy from Daidara Metalworks (Sell Thick Hide x5)

Quest Giver: Orange haired girl, Samagawa Flood Plain
Remarks: Dropped by Soul Dancer, Marukyu Striptease 1-4F
Dropped by Blind Cupid, Void Quest 3-4F

Quest Giver: Woman in heavy makeup, Okina City
Remarks: Obtain Gentleman's Tux from a gold chest in Yukiko's Castle.
Buy Barrier Corn seeds and harvest Tetracorn and Makaracorn for Daidara.

Quest Giver: Refreshed old man, Samegawa Flood Plain
Remarks: Dropped by Amenti Raven, Void Quest 3-4F
Dropped by Sky Balance, Marukyu Striptease 9-10F, 3 needed

Quest: What Was That in the Movie?
Remarks: Ask Ms. Sofue (Classroom Building 2F) about OOPArts, and then report to the movie girl.
"Group A", "Human motion", "Group B", "Indefinite articles"
Talk to the Older twin on Shopping District, South, then talk to the Younger twin on Riverbed and pick the first choice, come back and talk to the Older twin.
Dropped by Steel Machine, Void Quest 9-10F
"Judo Medalist Names", "How one should live as a punk", "2 pages per pest", "Me"
Dropped by Furious Gigas, Secret Laboratory 3-4BF
Obtain the Invincible Mini from Daidara (sell 8 Power Rocks dropped by Power Castle, Secret Lab 3-4BF and 6-8BF), give it to the NPC.
Dropped by Constancy Relic, Secret Laboratory 1-2BF
Dropped by Wicked Turret, Secret Laboratory 7-8BF
Dropped by Mach Wheel, Secret Laboratory 5-6BF

Quest Giver: Loud Old Man, Shopping District North
Remarks: Dropped by Power Castle, Secret Laboratory 7-8BF
Dropped by Elegant Mother, Secret Laboratory 7-8BF
Speak to the Riverbed Twin, then the Bookstore Twin; repeat

Find the dog at Shopping District, North. Call her each of the names, with "Mika-chan" last. The dog will run away. Come back for three days, feeding her Steak Skewers from the shop she's sitting in front of each day. On the third day, call her name again.
"Group B", "The way they're drawn", "Promethium", "Need"

Quest: The Girl on the Rooftop, Part 2
Quest Giver: Male student by the window, Classroom 2-2
Remarks: Dropped by Prime Magus, Heaven 1-2F
Dropped by Angry Table, Heaven floors 5-7
Dropped by Revelation Pesce, Heaven 6-7F
Dropped by Phantom Lord, Heaven 3-5F
Catch the Guardian from the River.
Find the cat at the Riverbank. Call it the different names prompted, and feed it 5 different fish for 5 days. On the fifth day, call it by the prompted names again to finish the request.
Dropped by Solemn Machine, Magatsu Mandala 6F
Dropped by Minotaur II, Magatsu Mandala 6F
Answer "Uruguay"
"Deoxyribonucleic Acid", "Rabbit"

Obtain Vidar's Boots from Daidara (sell 8 Bloody Hides dropped by Jotun of Blood, Heaven 8-9F), trade the boots to the student on Practice Building 2F to obtain the Animal Slippers. Give the slippers to Kashiwagi.

Quest: Dazzle Me With Animal Paw Gloves
Remarks: Magatsu Xandrite (x8) are dropped by golden shadows in any dungeon, but higher chance in late-game. Mondo Stone (x1) is obtained from the Lady in White at the Tatsuhime Shrine at night, traded for a Guardian from the river. Take these to Shiroku Pub at night to obtain the Animal Paw.
"Raster", "Latin", "Rome"
"Wind", "Upper, Middle, and Lower", "7", "Mameluke"
